content.p: Specialists from global aerospace and space companies and aviation leaders have joined forces with our researchers and academics and together we are creating an extraordinary future for aerospace and space technologies. Aerospace at the University of Nottingham has over 70 externally funded projects valued at over £75 million with an inspirational team comprising of hundreds of scientists, researchers and engineers. Our ambition and drive makes the IAT a partner of choice in our six key areas of research: Aerospace Manufacturing Aerospace Materials and Structures Aerospace Operations Whole Aircraft Space Future Propulsion and Systems We’re always searching to discover the next innovation within aerospace and space bringing people and projects together; if you share our ambition and passion for smarter, greener and faster aircraft, we’d like to hear from you. Aerospace Technology Centre Innovation Park Triumph Road Nottingham, NG7 2TU
